instructions.1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
instructions.2: Spread the chopped onion and mushrooms evenly in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish. Arrange chicken pieces over the vegetables, skin side up. Squeeze lemon juice over the chicken pieces, and season with garlic salt and pepper.
instructions.3: Bake chicken uncovered for 20 minutes in the preheated oven. Carefully turn the pieces over, and continue cooking 15 minutes more.
instructions.4: Set oven to broil. Cook chicken for 5 minutes, or until chicken skin is crisp.
